Reviews.Title: Good image quality, maddening interface
Reviews.Author: Blade "Blade"
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by the image quality out of this camera.  The lens is sharp and the images it produces are clean, even when viewed at 100% zoom (1:1).  Then there is the interface.  Every time this camera boots up, it goes into Automatic mode, meaning you have to jump through the clunky menu to get to program mode.  Then it forgets your image preferences such as vivid colors.  Why would they not put the option to return to previous mode.... why????In the end, I didn't feel like I needed to click 4-10 times to get me back to the mode I wanted everytime I powered the camera off.  Ridiculous.  Amazon was gracious and took the camera back with no issues.

Reviews.Title: kodak
Reviews.Author: kimberly casolino
Reviews.Content: it didn't even last two years. bought it in summer(6/11) and it broke down last month (3/13). very good camera,easy to use, but doesn't last long.

Reviews.Title: Maybe I just need new parents...
Reviews.Author: Annemarie Long
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my parents, who wanted something easy to use. I found the camera to be very easy to use and it takes good pictures. On occasion the shutter button acts up a bit, but I think that is the impatience of my Mother who refuses to read the instructions on how to take pictures!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PIC FROM KODAK CAMERA
Reviews.Author: E. Connolly "summer"
Reviews.Content: A NICE KODAK CAMERA THIS IS MY 4TH ONE IT WORKS REALLY GOOD AND TO BRING A PIC BACK TO YOU AFTER DELETE IS GREAT COME PARE FROM THE OLDER ONES  THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Clearest Pictures Ever.....
Reviews.Author: Q. Rashad
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera it takes clear crisp pictures the battery last loooong and I like that you can send the pictures right to FB and E-Mail ect.....it's just great to have this little camera with you to capture life's sweet memories.

Reviews.Title: Good camera fro the money
Reviews.Author: Roy L. Dodman
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kodak Easyshare M550.  I broke the first one my not fully fixing a problem with the battery coming loose.  This second camera works fine, and is easy to operate and maintain.  The quality of the pictures is very good.  I would rate the overall performance as 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: M550
Reviews.Author: Teresa Valencia
Reviews.Content: Easy camera to use. I purchased this for my job as a home inspector and it is perfect for working out in the field for what I do.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: E. A. Stafford "a.k.a Penny Lizer"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my Mother in law as she needed a nice point and shoot before leaving on a European trip...she wanted one that would be very easy to use but still take nice, crisp photos with excellent color capture.  This serves it's purpose well as a mid-grade, "idiot-proof" camera.  It has some pretty decent built in shoot modes and decent clarity when zoomed in.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: albmack
Reviews.Content: the camera came quickly and was exactly what we expected.  It takes great pictures and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Tiff
Reviews.Content: A nice little camera and it can take great pictures too as long as you know how to use it.The Easyshare software is a little buggy but as long as all the pictures are in the locations the software thinks they are in then it does pretty good.I got the purple one.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 30 x 40 inches
5x optical zoom; 28 mm wide-angle lens
2.7-inch LCD with KODAK Color Science Technology
Kodak's Smart Capture feature
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare M550 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Tan)
